data.chText: 阴暗的；幽暗的；阴影中的；多阴的

data.enText: Someone was waiting in the shadowy doorway.
data.chText: 有人守候在昏暗的门口。

data.enText: difficult to see because there is not much light
Shadowy figures approached them out of the fog.
data.chText: 从雾中模模糊糊出来几个人影，向他们走去。

data.enText: that not much is known about
data.chText: 鲜为人知的；神秘莫测的
鲜为人知的恐怖主义世界

example: the shady side of the street
the surface of the pond is dark and shadowed
we sat on rocks in a shadowy cove
strange fancies of unreal and shadowy worlds"- W.A.Butle
a dim figure in the distance
saw a vague outline of a building through the fog
a few wispy memories of childhood

example.ex: I watched him from a shadowy corner.
example.tran: 我躲在一个阴暗的角落里观察他。

value.def: A shadowy place is dark or full of shadows.
value.tran: 阴暗的;幽暗的;被阴影笼罩的

example.ex: ...a tall, shadowy figure silhouetted against the pale wall.
example.tran: 灰白的墙上映出一个高大而模糊的人影

example.ex: ...the shadowy shape of a big barge loaded with logs.
example.tran: 装满木材的巨大驳船的模糊轮廓

value.def: A shadowy figure or shape is someone or something that you can hardly see because they are in a dark place.

example.ex: ...a shadowy group calling itself the People's Army.
example.tran: 一个自称为“人民军队”的神秘组织

value.def: You describe activities and people as shadowy when very little is known about them.
value.tran: 鲜为人知的;神秘莫测的
